message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you offering it at $9000, but I'm looking to spend closer to $7500. Would you be willing to come down to that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8250. This is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $8250. I'm still hoping to get closer to my budget. Would you be willing to do $8000? I'm really interested in the product and want to make this work.

I understand your desire to get closer to your budget, Bob. However, I've already compromised a lot by coming down to $8250. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm offering it to you for $8400. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down. I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my budget. I'd be willing to do $8200. This would allow me to move forward with the purchase.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your budget, Bob. However, I've already made significant concessions. I'm willing to make one more slight adjustment, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm offering it to you for $8350. This is my final compromise.
